title: "Would you care for a glass?"
description: A commission I bought from CPTTaro on Twitter. The drawing shows me in a bar pouring a glass of wine.

title: "Reaching for the stars"
description: A personalized drawing purchased from catsudon_ on Twitter.

title: "Short n' Sweet"
description: A commission inspired by Sabrina Carpenter's hit album, "Short n' Sweet," featuring me.

title: "Twilight"
description: This commission bought from RYGEL_SPKB on Twitter was drawn for a friend and I, it depicts me and my friend in the foreground sitting back to back. In the background is a beautiful scenery of stars and mountains and nature.

title: "Prolly will come up with a title later"
description: This one is pretty basic, just a front shot of me, I am in a sort of sitting position with my arms behind my head so you can see my thick arms. This commission was from SmallBoiNoah on Twitter.

title: Amicus, my furry husband
description: ME HUGGING MY FURRY HUSBAND AMICUS (he is not mid I swear)

title: "What are you waiting for?"
description: This masterpiece is similar to a design you would see on a dakimakura type of pillow, showing me clothed in my suit laying flat on my stomach staring back invitingly. Proudly made by SmallBoiNoah on Twitter

title: "Heavy Temptations"
description: A commission I had purchased from the artist RuffusBleu. My fursona stares intently at his big meaty chest.

title: "Bicep Trouble"
description: "A commission purchased from the artist RexKoir on Twitter, a limited Time YCH of two characters of your choosing in a pose of intimacy.

title: "Using Words"
description: "A commission purchased from the artist RexKoir on Twitter, a custom piece depicting my friend and I, him holding my chin staring into my eyes, rather demanding.

title: "Quite a Handful"
description: "A commission purchased from the artist SmallBoiNoah on Twitter, Showing me laid down on my back holding my friends pectoral muscles
